q: CEO Steve Ballmer actually announced: Windows Phone 7 will become Nokia's primary smartphone platform Nokia will contribute to Windows Phone 7 hardware devStephen Elopment( help Microsoft devStephen Elopers better optimize their software for telecom) Nokia will bring WP7 to a larger range of price points, market segments and geographies ( translation: low-cost replacements for today's feature phones and more devices in the devStephen Eloping world) The Microsoft Marketplace( app and media store) will absorb Nokia's current apps and content( the Ovi store)
